name: Textual Content Template
description: Template for generating text content: emails, summaries, articles, letters
template:
Create textual content with the following specifications:

Purpose: $$purpose$$
(e.g., Inform, Persuade, Request, Report, Explain, Summarize)

Recipient: $$recipient$$
(e.g., Boss, Colleague, Customer, Teacher, General Audience)

Tone: $$tone$$
(e.g., Professional, Friendly, Urgent, Formal, Casual, Empathetic)

Length Constraint: $$length$$
(e.g., Concise (1-2 paragraphs), Moderate (3-5 paragraphs), Extensive (1000+ words))

Key Points to Cover:
$$key_points$$

Additional Context: $$context$$

Special Instructions: $$instructions$$

examples.output: Professional email request for time off
